original_text: And thou shalt make the breastplate of judgment with cunning work; after the work of the ephod thou shalt make it; of gold, of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, and of fine twined linen, shalt thou make it.
korean_text: 너는 판결 흉패를 에봇 짜는 방법으로 금 실과 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가늘게 꼰 베 실로 정교하게 짜서 만들되

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make the breastplate of judgment
after the work of the ephod thou shalt make it
of gold, of blue, and of purple
and of scarlet, and of fine twined linen
